title: Hint
text:
1) The given function is f(x) $$=$$ 2x² + $$x$$ - $$1$$.
2) For a quadratic function f(x) $$=$$ ax² + bx + c (with a > 0), the vertex represents the minimum point.
3) The x-coordinate of the vertex is given by $$ rac{-b}{2a}$$. Here, a $$=$$ $$2$$ and $$b$$ $$=$$ $$1$$, so
$$x$$ $$=$$ $$-1$$ / (2 × 2) $$=$$ $$ rac{-1}{4}$$ $$=$$ $$-0.25$$.
...
